name: Sharm Hills
verified_notes: Verified via Booking.com live check Jan 17, 2026 - TRUE 2BR apartment
ranking_notes: Top choice for its exceptional 9.8 Booking.com rating from 77 reviews - the highest rating among all verified properties. Features private beach access, large resort pool complex, and Ski-to-door beach proximity. At 741 EUR for 7 nights, it offers excellent value for a 2-bedroom apartment with verified separate sleeping areas. The Sharm Hills resort is consistently praised for cleanliness, pool quality, and convenient location near restaurants and shops. Perfect balance of amenities, reliability, and price.

vetting.notes: Exceptional 9.8 rating from 77 reviews on Booking.com. Excellent scores across all categories - cleanliness, location, staff, comfort, facilities, and value. No negative mentions in reviews.

name: White Hills Resort - Family Suite
verified_notes: Verified 2026-01-17: Family Suite with TRUE 2 SEPARATE BEDROOMS (Bedroom 1: 2 twin beds, Bedroom 2: 1 king bed), 60m² suite, All-Inclusive, 950m from White Knight Bay Beach
ranking_notes: ALL-INCLUSIVE WITH TRUE 2-BEDROOM SUITE. 60m² suite with 2 physically separate bedrooms - perfect for snoring isolation. 9.3 rating from 5,490 reviews (exceptional data reliability). All-Inclusive with airport shuttle, parking, early check-in included. Premium choice for hotel comfort with genuine bedroom separation.

vetting.notes: 9.3 rating from 5,490 reviews - highest review count in rankings. Highly reliable data. All-Inclusive includes full board. Premium resort amenities. No red flags found.

name: Sharm Hills (Guest favorite)
verified_notes: Verified via Booking.com live check Jan 17, 2026 - TRUE 2BR apartment
ranking_notes: Airbnb Guest Favorite badge with perfect 5.0 rating from 23 reviews and 100% five-star ratings across all categories. Located in the same excellent Sharm Hills resort through Airbnb, offering pool-view 2-bedroom apartment with garden outlook. Host Marwan has 100% response rate within an hour. Highlights include pool access, self check-in, private beach access 20 minutes walk, and dedicated workspace. At 886 EUR, slightly pricier than Booking option but the Airbnb platform offers different booking flexibility.

vetting.notes: Perfect 5.0 rating with 23 reviews, 100% 5-star. Guest Favorite badge. Minor note: one reviewer mentioned cleaning was 'acceptable for Sharm standards'. No smoke or CO alarms listed.
